tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE support_reports (
  ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_id UUID,
  customer_id UUID,
  ticket_date TIMESTAMP,
  ticket_status VARCHAR(50),
  agent_performance_rating INTEGER,
  customer_feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  issue_description TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE agent_performance (
  agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_name VARCHAR(50),
  total_tickets_handled INT,
  average_response_time FLOAT,
  satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE,
    resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE agent_performance (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(100),
    team_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    performance_rating INT,
    total_tickets_handled INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE service_effectiveness (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    accuracy_rating INT,
    improvement_suggestions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    ticket_status VARCHAR,
    ticket_created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE agent_performance (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    total_tickets_handled INT,
    average_response_time FLOAT,
    agent_rating FLOAT,
    agent_hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_rating FLOAT,
    feedback_comment TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE report_generation (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_type VARCHAR,
    generated_by_agent_id INT,
    generated_date TIMESTAMP,
    report_content JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE service_effectiveness (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_satisfaction_rating FLOAT,
    ticket_resolution_time FLOAT,
    agent_performance_rating FLOAT,
    service_improvement_suggestions TEXT
);
